summary: Diff adds a TanStack Router-based multi-page frontend (sign-in, contacts, call setup, in-call, call ended), Internet Identity auth gating + principal display, React Query-backed contacts CRUD UI, local camera preview and call controls, and a Motoko backend with per-user contacts and basic call session creation/join (more backend session methods may exist but are truncated).

hallucinated_features.description: Admin/role-based access control initialization via a secret URL parameter ("caffeineAdminToken") and authorization mixins on the backend/auth layer.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only required Internet Identity auth and per-caller scoping; it did not request an admin-token bootstrap mechanism or additional access-control framework.
